title: Phantasmat 7 - Reign of Shadows Collector's Edition [ASG]
description:
[color=red][b]No Need For Patches Or Serials Just Run Installer And Enjoy The Game![/b][/color] 

Join Sam, a boy of thirteen years old, and his friend Princess Aurora as they embark on an amazing adventure in the Kingdom of Aurelia. Just as this incredible world entered into an epoch EIPIX and BIG FISH Games proudly presents the newest installment of the exhilarating Phantasmat series!

After the death of your father, itâ€™s up to you to find your sister and give her the news. What starts as a simple journey to give her the will quickly takes a dangerous turn as malevolent shadows start invading the Arcadia Resort! Can you save your sister before itâ€™s too late, or will you fall into darkness? Find out in this spine-tingling hidden-object puzzle adventure!

The Collectorâ€™s Edition Features:
â€“ In the bonus game, help reveal the Arcadia Resortâ€™s history â€“ and banish the monster lurking there!
â€“ Collect hidden diary pages in every scene to unlock bonus content!
â€“ Find the morphing objects buried in every hidden-object puzzle.
â€“ Earn achievement awards for your mind-boggling game play.
â€“ Save your memories with pictures, concept art, and music.

[b]System Requirements:[/b]
